name: Cheat Squad
description:
Cheat Squad Demo.  

What is Cheat Squad?
Cheat Squad is a 2-player game (as of right now!) your main objective is to throw your opponent out of the stage using your gun. Every now and then a Cheat Code will be displayed in the center of the screen. You can choose to try and input the cheat code in order to obtain a powered-up weapon with limited ammo (knowing that your focus will be compromised) or to keep on playing with your current gun and hunt down distracted players.

Cheat Squad is in it's early stages and you can watch it grow as a product by downloading this demo and submitting your feedback!

How to play Cheat Squad?
Player 1 moves using the WASD keys, jumps with the F key and shoots with the G key.
Player 2 moves using the IJKL keys, jumps with the ; key and shoots with the ' key.

Credits

Programming, art and game design - Hector Magana.

Stage 3 Composed by Sawsquarenoise.
